summary: Successfully tested Sharda Lead Management Dashboard Geographic Map and KPI enhancements. All requested features are working correctly: Geographic Map tab with India state visualization, metric selector dropdown, hover tooltips, pie chart sidebar, top performing states with medals, and enhanced KPI cards with icon backgrounds and hover animations.
passed_tests: Geographic Map tab is first tab on Comparison page
India map visualization loads with 102 geographic elements (states)
Map metric selector dropdown with 3 options (Total Leads, Won Leads, Conversion %)
Map hover tooltip shows state performance details
Right sidebar Lead Distribution pie chart displays correctly
Top Performing States list with gold/silver/bronze medal colors
All 11 KPI cards display with proper titles and values
KPI cards have icon backgrounds (bg-muted/50, rounded-lg)
KPI cards have hover animations (hover:shadow, hover:-translate-y)
KPI cards have smooth transitions and cursor pointer
KPI card clickability affects leads table content
Enhanced visual design with shadows, rounded corners, transitions

success_percentage.frontend: 100% (All Geographic Map and KPI enhancement features working)
